altername_name: Kulfon in the Bad Demons Land
name: Kulfon W Krainie Zlego Demona
overview: Kulfon w krainie złego demona is a platform adventure game. Kulfon's fiancée was kidnapped and imprisoned in the castle. The player must find a way to rescue by using proper objects scattered in the surroundings, in the castle and the underground level. Kulfon may carry up to two items and interact with encountered characters. Fall from a height or swimming without diving equipment means the loss of life.
